TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XhtmlTextWriter extends System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter

summary.span: 将特定于可扩展超文本标记语言 (XHTML) 的字符（包括从 XHTML 派生的 XHTML 模块的所有变体）写入移动设备的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的输出流。

span.span: Writes Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML)-specific characters, including all variations of XHTML modules that derive from XHTML, to the output stream for an ASP.NET server control for mobile devices.

summary.span: 重写 类以为 ASP.NET 页和服务器控件提供自定义 XHTML 呈现。

span.span: Override the class to provide custom XHTML rendering for ASP.NET pages and server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XHTML 是一种基于 XML 的标记语言，基于 HTML 4.1，使你能够创建适用于多个设备类型的网站。XHTML is an XML-compliant markup language, based on HTML 4.1, which allows you to create Web sites that are suitable for multiple device types. 它将 HTML 提供的易用性与 XML 提供的严格元素准则结合起来，以生成带有各种格式和样式选项的标记语言，同时降低标记标记的歧义。It merges the ease of use provided by HTML with the strict element guidelines provided by XML to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options, and with reduced markup tag ambiguity. 类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在向客户端呈现 XHTML 内容时使用的格式化功能。The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients. 可以使用 方法指定文本编写器呈现的 XHTML 类型。You can use the method to specify which type of XHTML the text writer renders. 枚举中定义了支持的文档类型 。Supported document types are defined in the enumeration. 类呈现元素的两个属性集。The class renders two sets of attributes for elements. 一个集是公共特性的集合，在属性中引用 。One set is a collection of common attributes, as referenced in the property. 第二个集是元素特定特性的集合，如属性中所引用 。The second set is a collection of element-specific attributes, as referenced in the property. 有关呈现的元素和样式的详细信息，请参阅 [万维网联合会 (W3C) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上的 XHTML 模块化规范。For more information on the elements and styles that are rendered, see the XHTML modularization specification at the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 您可以使用类的成员 和任何派生类来创建自定义的文本编写器，以在自定义 XHTML 页适配器或类适配器中使用。You can use the members of the class and any derived classes to create custom text writers to use in custom XHTML page adapters or class adapters. 你还可以创建替代类的标准行为的派生类 。You can also create derived classes that override the standard behavior of the class. 默认情况下，当你使用的浏览器支持 HTML 4.0 时，ASP.NET 页和控件将呈现与 XHTML 1.1 标准兼容的标记。By default, when you are working with browsers that support HTML 4.0, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.1 standard. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)). 除非专门将 ASP.NET 配置为不呈现 xhtml 标记，否则输出 xhtml。The outputs XHTML unless you configure ASP.NET specifically to not render XHTML markup. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 ASP.NET 网站中配置 XHTML 呈现](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178159(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178159(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本节中的代码示例包含四个部分。The code example in this section contains four parts. 第一个示例演示如何创建派生类。The first example demonstrates how to create a derived class. 第二个代码示例演示如何创建自定义控件。The second code example demonstrates how to create a custom control. 第三个代码示例演示如何使用自定义控件。The third code example demonstrates how to use the custom control. 第四个代码示例提供运行自定义控件所需的代码。The fourth code example provides the code that is required to run the custom control. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建派生自类的自定义类 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom class that is derived from the class. 它有两个构造函数，这是直接或间接从类继承的所有类的标准 。It has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that inherit directly or indirectly from the class. 第一个构造函数采用 对象作为参数，并调用第二个构造函数，同时传递以下两个参数值：The first constructor takes a object as a parameter and calls the second constructor, passing the following two parameter values: - 实例。The instance. - 属性的值 ，定义 XHTML 文本编写器使用的默认行缩进。The value of the property, which defines the default line indentation that is used by the XHTML text writer. 此代码示例还演示了如何重写 和 方法，分别用于筛选文本大小和颜色样式。This code example also shows how to override the and methods to filter for text size and color style, respectively. 此外，它会重写 和 方法，以便在呈现控件之前和之后编写文本字符串。Additionally, it overrides the and methods to write a text string before and after a control has rendered. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 名为的自定义控件 `TestLabel` 和一个名为的自定义适配器 `XhtmlTestLabelAdapter` ，该适配器将控件内容呈现为 XHTML。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control named `TestLabel` and a custom adapter named `XhtmlTestLabelAdapter` that renders the content of the control as XHTML. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何 `TestLabel` 在 ASP.NET 网页上使用自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the custom control `TestLabel` on an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.aspx#4)] 若要在前面的代码示例中使用自定义控件，请将以下 `` 元素添加到以下两个文件之一。To use the custom control in the preceding code example, add the following `` element to one of two files. 可以将其添加到特定浏览器的子目录中的相应计算机范围内的文件中，作为 .NET Framework 配置目录的子文件夹。You can add it to the appropriate machine-wide file in the subdirectory for a specific browser, as a subfolder of the .NET Framework configuration directory. 或者，你可以将其添加到 Web 应用程序根目录下的 App_Browsers 目录中的自定义浏览器文件。Alternatively, you can add it to a custom browser file in the App_Browsers directory under the Web application root. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将特性添加到 XHTML 元素。Use the method to add an attribute to an XHTML element. 然后，可由对象识别并呈现添加的属性 。The added attribute can then be recognized and rendered by the object. 若要防止编写器呈现 XHTML 元素的公共属性，请使用 方法。To prevent the writer from rendering a common attribute of an XHTML element, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含在 XHTML 元素中允许的属性，这些属性不会在属性中取消 。The collection contains attributes that are allowed in XHTML elements and that are not suppressed in the property. 有关常见特性的详细信息，请参阅 [ (W3C) 网站万维网联合会](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on common attributes, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 创建类的新实例时 ，将初始化的公共特性如下：When a new instance of the class is created, the common attributes that are initialized are: - `class` - `id` - `title` - `xml:lang`

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 方法可将可识别的特性添加到 XHTML 元素。Use the method to add recognized attributes to an XHTML element. 若要删除 XHTML 元素上的公共属性，请使用 方法。To remove common attributes on an XHTML element, use the method. 创建类的新实例时 ，将 使用下表中显示的属性填充特定于元素的特性的对象。When a new instance of the class is created, the object of element-specific attributes is populated with the attributes shown in the following table. |元素Element|属性Attributes| |-------------|----------------| |``|`accesskey`, `href`, `charset`, `hreflang`, `rel`, `type`, `rev`, `title`, `tabindex``accesskey`, `href`, `charset`, `hreflang`, `rel`, `type`, `rev`, `title`, `tabindex`| |``|`href`| |`
`|`cite`| |`
`|`id`, `class`, `title``id`, `class`, `title`| |`
`|`action`, `method`, `enctype``action`, `method`, `enctype`| |``|`xml:lang`| |``|`version`, `xml:lang`, `xmlns``version`, `xml:lang`, `xmlns`| |``|`src`, `alt`, `width`, `longdesc`, `height``src`, `alt`, `width`, `longdesc`, `height`| |``|`size`, `accesskey`, `title`, `name`, `type`, `disabled`, `value`, `src`, `checked`, `maxlength`, `tabindex``size`, `accesskey`, `title`, `name`, `type`, `disabled`, `value`, `src`, `checked`, `maxlength`, `tabindex`| |`

summary.span: 检查一个 XHTML 特性以确保它可以在 元素的开始标记中呈现。

span.span: Checks an XHTML attribute to ensure that it can be rendered in the opening tag of a element.

returns.span: 如果特性可以应用于 元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute can be applied to a element; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法可用于根据请求的设备的 XHTML 文档类型有条件地呈现特性。This method is useful to conditionally render an attribute depending on whether it is supported by the XHTML document type of the requesting device. ## Examples 下面的代码示例摘自一个更大的示例，该示例创建一个自定义 控件和一个将控件内容呈现为 XHTML 的适配器。The following code example is part of a larger example that creates a custom control and an adapter that renders the content of the control as XHTML. 此代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的布尔变量 `attTest` ，并将其设置为通过调用 具有参数值 "style" 的方法而产生的返回值。This code example demonstrates how to create a Boolean variable named `attTest` and set it to the return value that results from calling the method with the parameter value "style". 如果该 方法返回 `true` ，则使用和方法呈现与该控件关联的样式 。If the method returns `true`, the styles that are associated with the control are rendered using the and methods. 如果 `attTest` 值为 `false` ，则不呈现样式。If the `attTest` value is `false`, the styles are not rendered. 相反，此页显示控件的文本、 `
` 由方法呈现的元素 ，以及一个文本字符串，通知用户控件的 XHTML 内容有条件地呈现。Instead, the page displays the text for the control, a `
` element that is rendered by the method, and a text string informing the user that the XHTML content of the control has rendered conditionally. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以检查是否为 `size` 此文本编写器呈现的任何元素呈现特性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to check whether a `size` attribute is rendered for any of the elements that are rendered by this text writer. 如果 `size` 呈现属性，则代码将检查其值是否为8磅。If a `size` attribute is rendered, the code checks whether its value is 8 point. 如果是这样，则该 方法返回 `true` ，允许属性及其值呈现。If so, the method returns `true`, allowing the attribute and its value to render. 如果值不是8点，则方法将 返回 `false` ，并且不呈现特性及其值。If the value is other than 8 point, the method returns `false`, and the attribute and its value are not rendered. 如果方法的键参数 与特性不匹配，则将 调用方法的基本功能 ，如类中所定义 。If the key parameter of the method does not match the attribute, the base functionality of the method is called, as defined in the class. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以检查是否 正在为此文本编写器呈现的任何元素呈现特性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to check whether a attribute is being rendered for any of the elements that are rendered by this text writer. 如果 呈现属性，则代码将检查其值是否为紫色。If a attribute is rendered, the code checks whether its value is purple. 如果值为紫色，则 方法将返回 `false` ，并且不呈现特性及其值。If the value is purple, the method returns `false` and the attribute and its value are not rendered. 如果 特性设置为任何其他值，则方法将 返回 `true` ，并且将呈现特性及其值。If the attribute is set to any other value, the method returns `true` and the attribute and its value are rendered. 如果方法的键参数 与特性不匹配，则将 调用方法的基本功能 ，如类中所定义 。If the key parameter of the method does not match the attribute, the base functionality of the method is called, as defined in the class. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指定文本编写器要呈现到页或控件的 XHTML 文档类型。

span.span: Specifies the XHTML document type for the text writer to render to the page or control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 自定义页适配器中的方法可以定义要呈现到请求设备的 XHTML 类型。Use the method in a custom page adapter to define the type of XHTML that you want to render to the requesting device. 枚举中定义了支持的文档类型 。Supported document types are defined in the enumeration.

summary.span: 获取由取消了 特性的元素组成的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object of elements for which attributes are suppressed.

value.span: 元素的 ，其中包含未呈现的 的集合。

span.span: A of elements containing a collection of that are not rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消的特性集合包含未呈现其特性的 XHTML 元素列表 。The suppressed attribute collection includes a list of XHTML elements for which attributes are not rendered. 创建类的新实例时 ， 禁止显示其属性的元素的对象 包括：When a new instance of the class is created, the object of elements for which attributes are suppressed includes: - `base` - `meta` - `br` - `head` - `title` - `html` - `style`

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承的 方法，以便使用 方法和具有方法的元素编写文本字符串 `
` 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the inherited method to write a text string with the method and a `
` element with the method. [!code-csharp[system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_sample2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#4)] [!code-vb[system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_sample2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#4)]
